en.title: Upload application form
en.submitAdditionalForm: Submit additional form if you are not the applicant
en.youNeed: Please upload the application form that you have already completed.
en.youNeed2: If you are not the person name on the application, you need to complete an additional form to ask for permission to apply on behalf of someone else.
en.youNeed3: You may also need to upload a confidentiality form if you need the details of the person named on the application to be kept confidential.
en.downloadC8Form: If you have not already downloaded the C8 form, you can download it by clicking here (opens in a new tab)
en.uploadDescription: Please upload all required forms below.
uploadRequirement: File formats: MS Word, MS Excel, PDF, JPG, GIF, PNG, TXT, RTF
File size per document: up to 20 megabytes (MB)
You can’t upload executable(.exe) .zip or other archive files due to virus risks.

applicationUpload.sizeError: File size exceeds 20Mb. Please upload a file that is less than 20Mb
applicationUpload.formatError: This service only accepts files in the formats - Ms Word, Ms Excel, PDF, JPG, GIF, PNG, TXT, RTF
applicationUpload.totalFilesExceededError: You can upload 5 files only. Please delete one of the uploaded files and retry
applicationUpload.continueWithoutUploadError: You cannot continue without uploading the application
applicationUpload.noFileUploadError: Please choose a file to upload

cy.title: Upload application form - (Whelsh)

cy.youNeed: Please upload the application form that you have already completed. - (Whelsh)
cy.youNeed2: If you are not the person name on the application, you must need to complete an additional form to ask for permission to apply on behalf of someone else. - (Whelsh)
cy.youNeed3: You may also need to upload a confidentiality form if you need the details of the person named on the application to be kept confidential. - (Whelsh)
cy.downloadC8Form: If you have not already downloaded the C8 form, you can download it by clicking here (opens in a new tab) - (Welsh)
cy.uploadDescription: Please upload all required forms below. - (Whelsh)
uploadRequirement: File formats: MS Word, MS Excel, PDF, JPG, GIF, PNG, TXT, RTF (welsh)
File size per document: up to 20 megabytes (MB) (welsh)
You can’t upload executable(.exe) .zip or other archive files due to virus risks. (welsh)
